text:
West 251st Street, north side, between Broadway and Post Road. The houses, the rears of which are seen, are situated on Post Road, at, adjoining and north of the N.E. corner of West 251st Street. The small drive-way, on which automobiles are parked is the old Albany Post Road, at this date (1937) non-existent.

July 18, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

Broadway, west side, between West 251st and 252nd Streets, showing greenhouses in the background, directly off the east side of Post Road.

July 18, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.
